attributes.action: abandon  the plans to introduce fortnightly waste collections
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
this petition is to advise the scientists research department 
to come into the real world, and see what happens when their fortnightly waste collections are introduced on their recommendations. and the  local goverment officials to do the same.the amount of recycling materials is welcomed. but  we have three vehicles collecting now instead of one. one for plastics only if they look like a bottle.another vehicle for cans and glass. and  cardboard if it is plain.
and the other for waste collections.
all different staff. and   leave as much mess as they can including broken glass  tinlids  plastic bottles and news papers etc. boxes that there put in left to the wind to blow them around and scatter their contents so come on down and live in the real world.
